Name: Halloween Decoration Sandbox
About the game: Modify terrain in an open world sandbox map editor. Place scenery around the world. Add Halloween decorations to the sandbox. Walk around with your character trick or treating collecting candy throughout the sandbox. Decorate Your Sandbox! Explore In Open World!
